title: Ranked Queue Still Available
body:
If I reach Gold before midnight tonight will I still be able to obtain season rewards?

Will the ranked queue be available through all of the pre-season?

replies.body: so ranked for oce is done right? this is confusing considering you said that ranked would go down when it was over.. a lot of people are under the impression that we can still climb until 12am tomorrow morning.. can you clear this up please? will ranked officially  be done for oce? is my rank now/last night going to show what border ill get? if I got to diamond tonight would it update and give me   diamond border or is it done?

> [{quoted}](name=Unspoken,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XrmAJoq1,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-11-11T00:51:07.038+0000)
>
> so ranked for oce is done right? this is confusing considering you said that ranked would go down when it was over.. a lot of people are under the impression that we can still climb until 12am tomorrow morning.. can you clear this up please? will ranked officially  be done for oce? is my rank now/last night going to show what border ill get? if I got to diamond tonight would it update and give me   diamond border or is it done?

As below from Riot Gehirn, Season Rewards will be based upon your rank at 12AM on 11th Nov AEDT. As of right now, that was roughly 12 hours ago.  The season has ended, but that doesn't mean that Ranked is no longer available... 

Instead we're in preseason - with all of the changes that go with it! Ranked will remain on during preseason as with previous preseasons.

Season rewards will be based on your rank at 12 AM on 11th Nov AEDT.

Ranked will remain turned on as normal throughout the preseason.
when are rewards handed out then?

Rewards are being handed out between now and the end of Nov 17th. See season end article for more info:

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2015-ranked-season-draws-close
Oh okay so the rewards and all that are done.  No worries, thought it may of been tonight at midnight and the 11th ends.

Season is over. what rank you were as of 12am this morning is the rank at the end of season. 

There will be ranked queues up in pre-season.
